title: The Finlay J. Macdonald Omnibus
description: An ominibus edition of Finlay J.Macdonald's nostalgic and often hilarious accounts of growing up on the Hebridean Island of Harris between the wars. They were published individually as "Crowdie and Cream", "Crotal and White" and "The Corncrake and the Lysander".
author: Finlay J. Macdonald
